name: stXAI
description: stXAI is a liquid staking derivative of the XAI token, part of the broader XAI ecosystem. The XAI ecosystem is a Layer 3 gaming blockchain built on Arbitrum, designed to support decentralized gaming applications and infrastructure. XAI staking is highly attractive to users, offering up to 120% APR (10% monthly) in rewards. However, the conventional XAI staking system comes with significant drawbacksâ€”tokens are locked up for up to 180 days, and early redemptions can incur penalties as high as 75%. This can limit flexibility and access to funds, despite the high yield potential.
